name: Dustwaves
description:
A Relaxing Experience

You will go through more of an experience than a game but our goal was to put you in a relaxed state of mind.

We hope you'll feel calmer after playing this, especially with the rush and stress of these days :)

Game realised for the Global Game Jam 2018 with the theme "Transmission"

Story 

It's yours to tell ! We wanted this game to be the more abstract possible so everybody can see something else in it.

Controls

You can use a Keyboard or a Controller

ButtonsUseLeft Joystick     OR     WASDMove the left avatarRight Joystick     OR     Arrow Keys
Move the right avatar Credits

We are all Game Design students so we thought about this concept all together.

Thomas Rousseau Game Design, ProgrammingPaul Lyaudet Game Design, ProgrammingBenoit Deneaux Game Design, UI DesignVincent Sosthène Game Design, UI DesignCharlie Morel Game Design, Sound DesignCharlotte Fries Game Design, Game Artist, Project Manager
